Package wellen.dsp

Class BeatDSP

java.lang.Object
wellen.dsp.BeatDSP
All Implemented Interfaces:
DSPNodeInput
public class BeatDSP extends Object implements DSPNodeInput
similar to Beat with the exception that events are triggered from DSP.
